name: teslonda-servers
description: RPI3 CAN interface with web socket server and web server

scripts.init_and_start_vcan_server: ./RPI_system/start_vcan.sh && NODE_ENV=production CHANNEL=vcan0 node canserver.js & npm run web_server
scripts.start_vcan_server: NODE_ENV=production CHANNEL=vcan0 node canserver.js & npm run web_server
scripts.can_server: NODE_ENV=production CHANNEL=can0 node canserver.js & npm run web_server

author: Michael J Mathews II
